skins.shipDescription: Huh? Why are you staring at me like I'm some weirdo? I'll have you know, it's not like I wanted to do this or anything!
skins.selfIntroduction: I'm the mightiest heavy cruiser in the world, Admiral Hipper of the Iron Blood. It's not like I wanted to do this or anything, I just had no say in the matter.
skins.acquisition: Huh? Why are you staring at me like I'm some weirdo? I'll have you know, it's not like I wanted to do this or anything!
skins.login: Lessons are finally done for the day. Good grief, why'd I ever agree to do this...!
skins.details: ...My guitar sounds a bit off today... Huh, try tuning it? Nah, that's not it, I just have to warm up a bit more...
skins.secretaryIdle1: Hey idiot, tell me what's next on my schedule! How long do you intend to keep me waiting?
skins.secretaryIdle2: Deutschland, it's fine to be proud of your sister, but have some self-control! ...Jeez, you're so lucky to have such a reliable sister... Meanwhile, look what I'm stuck with...
skins.secretaryIdle3: Huh? Who asked you to be my publicist? I'll earn my own fans!
skins.secretaryTouch: Haah? Who gave you permission to touch me?!
skins.secretarySpecialTouch: H-haah?! You did that on purpose, didn't you?!
